title: Gluten free cola cake
ingredients: ['For the cake', '250g gluten free or self-raising flour', '45g cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '150g caster sugar or light brown soft sugar', '150g butter, salted or unsalted', '200ml cola, any type', '150ml buttermilk or milk', '2 medium eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'For the icing', '100g chocolate', '45ml cola, any type', '45ml buttermilk or milk']
